comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: This Fokker E.I is the aircraft flown by Ernst Freiherr von Althaus, seen posing with the aircraft. von Althaus was a winner of the Pour le Merite after scoring 8 victories. He flew the Fokker E.I, II, III, and IV in combat. Later, when the Jastas were created, he flew with Jasta 4 using Halberstadt D.II, III, and D.V fighters. He was later commander of Jasta 10, but relieved of command by Manfred von Richthofen and replaced. He was quite a character, gambler, etc.
